body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Enchant an AI creature with Guard Duty
2. [Sometimes] the creature attacks 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Creatures with defender cannot attack.
Expect not to see that creature attack. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Version 1.18 on Windows XP SP3 Please provide any additional information below. See attached screen shot. Goblin Chieftain has been enchanted with Guard Duty and it is attacking.
author: [zarob...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/110807682538348407793/)
title: Creature enchanted with Guard Duty still attacks

comments.body:
Good to see someone is playing and paying attention :)

This is a known bug and was reported before in issue 67 . The fix will be in version 1.19.

I'll keep the other issue you made ( issue 73 ) open for a while because you might see it happen again or maybe somebody can reproduce it. If not, it will eventually be closed.

Thanks for trying to help improve Magarena.

**Status:** Duplicate
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

content:
_From [zarob...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/110807682538348407793/) on October 11, 2011 22:20:05_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Enchant an AI creature with Guard Duty
2. [Sometimes] the creature attacks 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Creatures with defender cannot attack.
Expect not to see that creature attack. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Version 1.18 on Windows XP SP3 Please provide any additional information below. See attached screen shot. Goblin Chieftain has been enchanted with Guard Duty and it is attacking.
